title: I don't know if this was asked about Skarner before but
body: if there are two skarners, will there be 2 Crystals in the same place everywhere?

replies.body:
There will still be one crystal in all the same spots.

In a mirror match, the ones closest to your team will spawn with your skin's effects.

In all-for-one, they will be mostly random as to which skin they choose.
